data.name: PageTitle
data.value: «Ciomny Los» - podcast about what Belarusians do 🤍❤️🤍

data.name: WhereToSee_Paragraph_1
data.value: The podcast «Ciomny Los» is available on almost all podcast platforms and on YouTube. In addition, the podcast has its own Telegram and TikTok. All the links are listed below:

data.name: About_Paragrarh_21
data.value: The podcast is released biweekly on YouTube and all podcast platforms. You can request to be a guest on the podcast

data.name: About_Paragrarh_1
data.value: «Ciomny Los» is a talk podcast in Belarusian, in which Belarusians talk about their occupations and reflect on Belarusianness. Each episode is a new profession or occupation: from scientists and programmers to musicians, comedians and even Tolkien fans!

data.name: Merch_Paragraph_13
data.value: : hoodies, T-shirts, hats, mugs and stickers!

data.name: Merch_Paragraph_2
data.value: With each purchase you will support me by about $5, thank you very much! 😊

data.name: Merch_Paragraph_11
data.value: I also make cool merch that often appears in podcast episodes. You can buy it at

data.name: Support_Card_1
data.value: You can also support «Ciomny Los» once with a money transfer from your card via Revolute and PayPal, or by direct transfer to my PayPal account.

data.name: Support_Card_2
data.value: More information you can find on «Support» page.

data.name: Support_Crypto_2
data.value: For more information about my crypto and token addresses, visit the «Support» page.

data.name: Support_Crypto_1
data.value: You can support the podcast through some cryptocurrencies and tokens: BTC, ETH, USDT and others.

data.name: Support_Patreon_1
data.value: You can support the podcast by subscribing to Patreon.

data.name: Support_Patreon_2
data.value: Podcast patrons get access to my private Discord server and private Russian-language podcast «Beard News».
